io.apptik.comm.jus

Class ConnectivityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.apptik.comm.jus.ConnectivityManager

  • public abstract class ConnectivityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementers should call connected() or disconnected() whener the state changes
